name: Analytics code
author: Qualitypoint Technologies

sections.description: Analytics code is simple plugin.Using this plugin you can easily load your analytics code in all pages of your wordpress site.
sections.installation:
If you have ever installed a WordPress plugin, then installation will be pretty easy:

  1. Download the Analytics code plugin archive and extract the files
  2. Copy the resulting Analytics code directory into /wp-content/plugins/
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu of WordPress
  4. Enter your analytics code through option page.
sections.faq:
Where do I get support and further information

For support and further information about the Analytics code plugin see the plugins homepage .

short_description: Analytics code is easy to load your analytics code in all pages of your wordpress site.
